articles.description: India batting legend Sunil Gavaskar believes the spinner has made the most of the opportunities that came his way, and he would make it difficult for Jadeja to make it back into the team.
articles.content: India allrounder Ravindra Jadeja suffered an injury during the 3rd Test against Australia and he had to undergo surgery that kept him out of contention of making it into the Test squad against Englan… [+1256 chars]
